resources.string: I hope you enjoy my app
Change how SayMyName behaves at this place / time.
You should hear me talking. If not, please restart your phone and try again.
Locale controls your preferences based on your location.
You have to install TTS (Text-to-Speech-Library) to use this app.
Ringdroid allows you to edit your ringtone and other music-files.
Don\'t speak when phone is silent
How often should it repeat the name?
Set the timeout between reading the name
Set the timeout between reading the name (0 = don\'t repeat name)
Set how many times the caller should be repeated
Set how many times the caller should be repeated (0 = don\'t repeat name)
Only read name till first space
Ringtone starts too fast? Edit it!
Change how the name is read
Add some words to the name
Add some words to the name (insert % for the name, e.g.: % calling)

Want to know who´s calling without looking at your phone? This app will tell you!
It reads the caller ID saved in your adressbook and tells you who´s calling
*Donut version available at the market!*
*Now with Locale Plug-in!*
Thanks to all who gave me feedback and sent me ideas!
*You will get prompted to install TTS*
Want to know who´s calling without looking at your phone? This app will tell you
